meanings.definition: A person who lavishes or spends money or gifts extravagantly.
meanings.sent1: The lavishers at the party were generous with their gifts.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy businessman was known as one of the biggest lavishers in town.
meanings.sent3: The lavishers decided to surprise their friend with an over-the-top birthday present.
meanings.sent4: She was a lavishers when it came to decorating her house for the holidays.
meanings.sent5: The lavishers' extravagant spending habits left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Those who lavish or bestow something in large amounts.
meanings.sent1: The lavishers of compliments made everyone feel special.
meanings.sent2: The generous lavishers of praise were appreciated by all.
meanings.sent3: The lavishers of attention always made sure to include everyone in the conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a paradise, thanks to the lavishers of care and attention she gave it.
meanings.sent5: The lavishers of love in the family created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
